title: Ministries operating with NO Minister; Secretaries to take charge
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A discussion was held between the Secretaries to the Ministries and the Secretary to the President, Gamini Senarath at the Presidential office on Wednesday (6) regarding the current situation.
The Secretary to the President has instructed all Secretaries to the Ministries of Cabinet and State Ministries to conduct the activities of all Ministries as planned without any obstruction.

Secretary to the Ministry of Public Service, Provincial Councils, and Local Government, J.J ​​Ratnasiri stated that the Secretary to the President had instructed to pay special attention to providing all essential goods and services to the people during the New Year season.
President must go for us to consider any proposal – Anura Kumara
